backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with order, user, design, and access-control data structures and state, plus helpers for validation and role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries of major frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions and light/dark mode CSS variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch, and activate handlers with mixed cache strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and bootstrap logic handling authentication, profile loading, access checks, and overall layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permission, with message and navigation button.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Displays a blocked user message with logout functionality and clears cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Shows an error screen for profile bootstrap failures with retry and logout options plus technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for login conflicts.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without profiles and allows copying the principal ID for admin setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first admin user to enter a name and trigger initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Checks user role and conditionally renders children or an access-denied screen.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design image mappings with basic metadata and creation dates.
Dialog to view a design image with loading, error, and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global error boundary that displays a fallback UI with error details and logout/reset actions.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing raw technical error details with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert with optional retry and detailed error information.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides a dropdown UI for exporting orders in CSV, PDF, or JPEG formats, including per‑karigar exports with filtering by date.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Adds export controls for a single karigar, allowing daily or total PDF/JPEG exports based on filtered orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Offers filtering (all, date, design) and export options for karigar orders, triggering PDF/JPEG generation via a callback.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Displays detailed order information in a dialog with an option to open a design image viewer.
Defines the main app layout with role‑based navigation, mobile/desktop menus, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog form for creating or editing master design mappings, saving updates via a mutation.
Dialog for uploading and parsing master design files, showing parsed results and importing them into storage.
Table listing master designs with edit and activation toggles for each entry.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Scrollable preview table showing parsed order data and highlighting unmapped design codes.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Warning banner indicating skipped or corrupted orders with an option to clear cached data.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar allowing users to filter orders by karigar, status, date, type flags, and optionally order number.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Comprehensive orders table with optional selection, actions, and sanitized order rendering.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial fulfillment quantities for RB orders with validation.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog component allowing users to edit an order’s total supplied quantity with validation and backend update mutation.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Compact status widget showing backend online/offline/checking state with refresh, canister ID display, and copy support.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Status bar reflecting network connectivity and pending offline sync operations with manual sync triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Hook that periodically performs backend health checks, classifies errors, and exposes reachability status and data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Hook for copying text to the clipboard with simple success/error status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook fetching the caller’s user profile with error classification, retry rules, and actor integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Hook deriving the effective app role by combining user profile role and backend admin detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, status, and session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend results, sanitizes and persists valid orders, and exposes loading/error/cache utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, sanitizing, persisting, and mutating orders and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with identity handling, timeout protection, optional admin initialization, and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and custom component styles for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF for karigar orders with totals, layout styling, and iOS-friendly handling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters and formats orders into CSV files for various export types and triggers file download.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, resolving karigar and generic names, and returns mapped/unmapped sets.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing internal whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits orders into fixed-size batches for upload or processing.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics and per-karigar statistics after sanitizing orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Normalizes karigar names by trimming and replacing empty values with 'Unassigned'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Generates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using a 3-letter prefix and '01'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order’s timestamp by prioritizing uploadDate over createdAt and converting from nanoseconds.
Identifies customer orders by checking if the order type contains 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts sanitized orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sorts sanitized orders by formatted karigar name, then design code, then order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Provides a type guard for validating PersistentOrder objects and a sanitizer that filters invalid entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Extracts embedded images from an XLSX file using JSZip, assigning them to rows in order.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses design–image mappings from an Excel sheet and pairs rows with extracted embedded images.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design entries from a workbook using flexible header matching for design, generic, and karigar fields.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from a workbook with flexible column detection, validation, and customer-order inference.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads the SheetJS library if needed and reads an Excel file into a validated workbook object.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master design file parsing between PDF and Excel, handling extraction and errors.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files from PDF or Excel, flattening PDF text and delegating to format-specific parsers with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js dynamically and extracts page text into structured lines for tabular parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design entries from PDF-extracted lines by identifying headers and extracting code, generic name, and karigar.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row mode or fallback section-header mode, producing PersistentOrder objects.
Attempts to parse a single PDF table-row line into a PersistentOrder, validating formats and extracting fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, and upload queue with helpers for caching and queueing.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Provides a hook to sync queued offline ingestions, uploading batches and updating sync state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard that loads orders, applies filters per tab, manages bulk actions, and displays drill-down views and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Page for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving design image mappings from an Excel file.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays master design mappings with search, add, edit, and import functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides interfaces to create users, manage approvals, and block or unblock user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Karigar dashboard for viewing active orders, requesting approval, marking orders delivered, and exporting order lists.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, background image, and a single LoginButton for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Provides a form for entering and storing an admin bootstrap token, invalidates actor queries, and redirects after successful initialization.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles parsing, mapping, previewing, and batched uploading of order files with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays staff dashboards with tabbed order views, filtering, metrics, image viewing, and activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Shows unmapped design codes, allows searching and opening a form to create new master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, monitors updates, and logs activation events.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic cases and extracts safe error details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Converts raw errors into user-friendly messages using bootstrap error classification and decoding logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn’t resolve within the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for the Karigar Orders system.
